title: Thats new
body:
Had a top lane darius AFK because he didnt get herald buff.

I've seen some stupid reasons to AFK but thats right up there.

replies.body: Nothing wrong with the jungler getting it, can benefit them also. Pretty weak to quit cos they didn't get a new toy, kid needs to grow some balls.
Had a gangplank afk because he claimed we were kill stealing when he didn't get a kill after ultingright at the end of one of us 1v1ing someone on the enemy team etc (gangplank nowhere near)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fad6eZTDikA

a year ago, there was a Fizz who went afk after Jarvan 4 didnt give him the blue buff.
Lucky for me, he was in the opponent team.
so its not always terrible I guess?
I had a nasus who afked when I was jungling because I didn't camp his lane at level 1 against a teemo.
I can't even.
I had an adc who afked because his support cleared a wave at bot lane which would of destroyed our inner bot turret by the time she recalled from top lane
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
who took it? I've seen people top leave because jungle took it, unless the jungle "solos" it  automatically belongs to top... Had people who get so angry even though the buff was left for them
I took it as jg. I dont think it automatically belongs to anyone.

I don't use it often myself anyway, and usually give it to the laner, so i don't care if they get it. Sure I'm a bit bias towards laner getting it, just because i like to help lanes not take from them.

But, people think that "if they helped kill it", it belongs to them, not the jungler. They think that the jungler has "no right" to take the buff.
and here was me thinking the age of entitlement was over.

You can think that, but all those top laners out there don't. I give it for two reasons, A) its not worth them fighting you/abusing/flat out going afk because of it, and B) the role of jungle is to get the lanes ahead, not themselves.

C) jungle gets blamed when things go sour, because they are a "support" role, they are meant to support the team and get them ahead, in not doing so they usually get blamed when the team starts losing.
Aced enemy team, walked through enemy jungle and Ezreal took blue when Ahri wanted it. Ahri fkin went afk for that and we lost the game. Saddest part is we have a blue buff open on our own jungle

eeeww... 

I really dont understand why people do this flipping ali ship.
I just laughed after the game, idk how to actually react to it. It was so dumb
its all you can do. mute, report, block, move on.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I am so sick, and tired, of people leaving games.

And personally that means a lot coming from me, as 12 months ago.. I was a rage-quitter. Some games do require a state of 'Zen' just to get through them, but thats all you need to do.. Get through it. There's always another game to get what you want.

Clearly this Darius had no 'Zen' about himself, and was a very selfish player.. 

All I recommend to all players, is ALWAYS report people for leaving a game. Hell, I report people for simply saying 'GG EZ' at the end of a game, even if it is my team. I am one for good banter between teams, if it is warranted.. But condescending statements such as 'GG easy' 'LOL TOO EAZY' are uncalled for in any situation.




GGWP

People rely on herald buff? Heh, only time i ever bother with it is if im top Xin, otherwise it doesn't impact me what so ever. 

If you need such a small thing to feel your game is good...

I pity the fool 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
tfw I always leave it for the top because I just want stacks or to stop the enemy having it and 90% of the time they just walk off without it
